      • readScalingFactors

        public static java.util.List<Country> readScalingFactors(java.lang.String path)
                                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Reads scaling factors for each country from scaling factor file.
        Parameters:
        path - Full path to scaling factor file.
        Returns:
        List of countries with scaling factors, short names and long names.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - File reading exception.

      • readDemand

        public static boolean readDemand(java.lang.String path,
                                 java.util.List<Country> countries,
                                 int rharvestyear)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Reads thinning and felling demands from demand file.
        Parameters:
        path - Full demand file path.
        countries - List of countries. Each country is updated.
        rharvestyear - Year when harvest starts
        Returns:
        True if successful, false if not.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - File writing exception.
